description: This file contains styling rules for the NextPiece component in a Tetris game frontend, defining the layout, appearance, and responsive styles for various elements of the component.

classes.name: nextPieceWrap
classes.description: A wrapper for the next piece display with a flex layout and styles for background, border, and padding.

classes.name: label
classes.description: Styling for labels associated with the next piece, including font color and weight.

classes.name: nextGrid
classes.description: Styling for the grid that displays the next piece, with layout, border, and background properties.

classes.name: row
classes.description: Flex container for rows in the next piece grid, allowing for flexible item arrangement.

classes.name: cell
classes.description: Styling for individual cells in the next piece grid, including size, background color, and shadow effects.
